LanguageData.Makai_PassArollcheck: {USER_labelShort} rolled a {1}({2}) and pass the roll check.
LanguageData.Makai_GreatPassArollcheck: {USER_labelShort} rolled a {1}({2}) and achieve a great success in roll check.
LanguageData.Makai_FailArollcheck: {USER_labelShort} rolled a {1}({2}) and fail catastrophically in roll check.
LanguageData.Makai_GreatFailArollcheck: {USER_labelShort} rolled a {1}({2}) and pawn skill wasn't high enough ({3}). need ({4})
LanguageData.Makai_SkillFailArollcheck: {USER_labelShort} rolled a {1}({2}) but pawn skill wasn't high enough ({3}). need ({4})
LanguageData.Makai_SkillFailDownGradeArollcheck: {USER_labelShort} rolled a {1}({2}) but pawn skill wasn't high enough ({3}). need ({4}). psycast has been downgraded to normal success.
LanguageData.Makai_SkillFailMinimum: {USER_labelShort} rolled a {1}({2}) but pawn skill are lower than minimum requirement({4})
LanguageData.Makai_FailArollcheckJoy: {USER2_labelShort} food and recreation is depleted! and caster has suddenly combust!
LanguageData.Makai_GreatPassArollcheckJoy: {USER2_labelShort} recreation increased by 100% and won't go down for 2 hour!
